title: Logo & Brand Mark Generator
description: Generate logo and brand identity design prompts for various business types

blocks.content: Brand name, industry, style, colors, symbol hint
Pure JSON, clean scalable designs, avoid complex gradients
JSON prompt pack with providers object
Clear concept, industry fit, scalability, no markdown

inputs.label: Symbol/Icon Hint (optional)
inputs.placeholder: e.g., abstract wave, mountain, letter T

agentReadiness.notes: Generated logos are starting points - vector tracing recommended for final use

author: meema-team
